sentences.sContent: But I had no food in my dorm, so I had to go to canteen.
sentences.sContent_eng: But I had no food in my dorm, so I had to go to canteen.
sentences.sCn: 但是我在宿舍没有东西可吃，所以我只能去餐厅了。

sentences.sContent: So, some can stay in the dorm for an entire month without talking at all with anyone.
sentences.sContent_eng: So, some can stay in the dorm for an entire month without talking at all with anyone.
sentences.sCn: 因此，有些学生能待在宿舍里整整一个月不与任何人讲话。

sentences.sContent: If you have a phone in your dorm or apartment, a cell phone, and any other phone numbers, consolidate them into one number with Google Voice.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you have a phone in your dorm or apartment, a cell phone, and any other phone numbers, consolidate them into one number with Google Voice.
sentences.sCn: 如果你有宿舍或公寓的号码、手机号码，还有其他什么电话号码，可以通过谷歌声音把它们集成为一个号码。

sentences.sContent: ...many Hamilton students grow passionate about the weighty volumes they still carry from dorm room to lecture hall to library...
